subject: Automatic conversion to short forms!
msgSnippet: Okay, I have not yet tested this driver, and I don t have the time to work on it now, so I m releasing it to the group now so you can experiment and bugfix.
messageBody:
Okay,

I have not yet tested this driver, and I don't have the time to work on it
now, so I'm releasing it to the group now so you can experiment and bugfix.

This is my NewRomaji-driver with built-in conversion to short/alternate
forms (and special buttons).

Please tell me what you think.

Ewout

I have not yet tested this driver, and I don't have the time to work on it
now, so I'm releasing it to the group now so you can experiment and bugfix.

This is my NewRomaji-driver with built-in conversion to short/alternate
forms (and special buttons).

Please tell me what you think.

Ewout
